hospital_info.name: Black Lion Specialized Hospital (Tikur Anbessa)
hospital_info.affiliation: College of Health Sciences, Addis Ababa University
hospital_info.type: Tertiary referral, teaching and research hospital
hospital_info.address: Queen Elizabeth II Street, Addis Ababa, Ethiopia

departments_and_services.location: National Oncology Center, Tikur Anbessa campus

working_hours.outpatient_departments: 8:30 AM to 4:30 PM, Monday to Friday

appointments.booking_process: Visit outpatient registration desk in person. Present patient ID or national ID. Choose department and obtain appointment slip. Payment processed at cashier before consultation.
required_documents: National ID or hospital patient card
Previous medical records for follow-up visits
appointments.cancellation_policy: Must be done at least 24 hours before appointment at registration desk. No refund if missed or cancellation not made in time.

pre_visit_instructions.blood_tests: Fast for 8 to 12 hours before glucose or lipid profile tests. Water only allowed.
pre_visit_instructions.abdominal_ultrasound: Avoid food or drink for at least 6 hours prior. Full bladder may be required for pelvic scans.
pre_visit_instructions.general_checkup: Bring list of ongoing medications. Wear comfortable clothing.
pre_visit_instructions.surgery: Follow doctor's fasting and medication discontinuation instructions. Arrange post-operation transport.
pre_visit_instructions.radiology: Remove jewelry and metal items. Report allergies such as contrast dye.
pre_visit_instructions.insurance: Approved insurers include Ethiopian Insurance Corporation, Nyala, United, and others. Bring policy documentation.

pharmacy_information.operating_hours: 8:30 AM to 5:00 PM, Monday to Friday
services: Patient counseling on dosage, side effects, and adherence
pharmacy_information.note: No prescriptions issued without doctor evaluation. Valid hospital card required for collection.

emergency_and_support.on_call_medical_officer: Available every shift through ER reception

additional_notes.teaching_facility: Services may involve supervised medical students
additional_notes.international_patients: Bring passport and translated medical history if possible
additional_notes.covid19_protocols: Masks and entrance screening may apply for vulnerable patients
